ghaṭiyā.comment: [openrouter: openrouter/sonoma-dusk-alpha] Likely an inflected form of a feminine adjective derived from 'ghaṭa' (pot, vessel) with suffix '-iya', indicating something related to or characterized by 'ghaṭa', but in Pāḷi idiomatically used for 'bad' or 'wicked' in moral sense. Context not provided, so meaning based on standard usage.
